description: States of Jersey approve a move towards community-based services for the island's healthcare.
title: Jersey Care Model seeks to reduce hospital 'dependency'
title_page: Jersey Care Model seeks to reduce hospital 'dependency' - BBC News
maintext: A 493-page proposition put to members on Tuesday said it would seek to move away from the "unsustainable institutional-based model" in place at present, and into "a more modern community-based model".
